messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5651
messages.messageBody:
<<I'm sorry someone badmouthed you by name in public. That sucks. But
it doesn't make your kids' lives less great, does it?

Sandra>>
No, not at all.
My kids, well the oldest..laugh it off. Better than I at times..

I think by speaking more and voicing opinions one sticks out more. I am
working on not getting twisted about it..
I spoke too personal yesterday. My intent was seeking information/links but
I went for being clear and that was wrong. My apologies for bringing local
issues here I know it's not on topic for the list..
Laura




Southern Maine Unschoolers
Site:http://www.southernmaineunschoolers.com
List:http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingMaine


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
